lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia 76ers rookie center Jahlil Okafor will have season-ending surgery on his right knee.

headline.print_headline: Sixers End 13-Game Losing Streak and Extend Nets’ Slide
headline.main: Sixers End 13-Game Losing Streak and Extend Nets’ Slide

snippet: The Philadelphia 76ers rookie center Jahlil Okafor will have season-ending surgery on his right knee.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Philadelphia 76ers defeat Brooklyn Nets 95-89, ending 13-game losing streak; other basketball scores.
